verses.verse: And <WG1161> it came to pass <WG1096> in <WG1722> Iconium <WG2430> that they <WG846> entered1525, 846 together <WG2596> into <WG1519> the synagogue <WG4864> of the Jews <WG2453>, and <WG2532> so <WG3779> spake <WG2980> that <WG5620> a great <WG4183> multitude <WG4128> both <WG5037> of Jews <WG2453> and <WG2532> of Greeks <WG1672> believed <WG4100>.

they became aware of <WG4894> it <WG2703>, and fled unto <WG1519> the cities <WG4172> of Lycaonia <WG3071>, Lystra <WG3082> and <WG2532> Derbe <WG1191>, and <WG2532> the region round about <WG4066>:
and there <WG2546> they preached the gospel <WG2258>.

And <WG2532> at <WG1722> Lystra <WG3082> there sat <WG2521> a certain <WG5100> man <WG435>, impotent <WG102> in his <WG846> feet <WG4228>, a cripple <WG5560> from <WG1537> his <WG846> mother <WG3384>'s womb <WG2836>, who <WG3739> never <WG3763> had walked <WG4043>.

The same <WG3778> heard <WG191> Paul <WG3972> speaking <WG2980>, who <WG3739>, fastening eyes <WG816> upon him <WG846>, and <WG2532> seeing <WG1492> that <WG3754> he had <WG2192> faith <WG4102> to be made whole <WG4982>,

And <WG1161> when <WG1492> the multitude <WG3793> saw <WG1492> what <WG3739> Paul <WG3972> had done <WG4160>, they lifted up <WG1869> their <WG846> voice <WG5456>, saying <WG3004> in the speech of Lycaonia <WG3072>, The gods <WG2316> are come down <WG2597> to <WG4314> us <WG2248> in the likeness <WG3666> of men <WG444>.
And <WG5037> they called <WG2564> Barnabas <WG921>, Jupiter <WG2203>; and <WG1161> Paul <WG3972>, Mercury <WG2060>, because <WG1894> he <WG846> was <WG2258> the chief <WG2233> speaker <WG3303>.
